charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2):  Felon in Possession of Firearm and Ammunition(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 10/19/16 JUDGMENT ON S/R: 24 mos to BOP to run concurrent with Tulsa County CF-2013-341; ORIGINAL JUDGMENT: 34 months to BOP; 3 years S/R; $500 Fine; $100 SMA; Interest Waived on Fine. Conditions to include: Firearm; Controlled Substance Restriction; DNA Sample; Alcohol Abstinence; Workforce Development; Financial; Search; Substance Abuse Testing and Treatment; Court recommends a facility as near as possible to Tulsa, OK, Substance abuse treatment and parenting program while incarcerated.

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(9)and 924(a)(2): Possess Firearm and Ammunition After Conviction of Misdemeanor Crime of Domestic Violence(2)
